Text.Value: Maybe. But I might find another use for this awesome bomb.
It's you... I might have time for a catch-up later.

EditorData.NodeContext: Mild surprise at the player being here/recognising them - but keen to stick to protocol

Text.Value: Still here? Go talk to Wulbren - he'll take any help he can get. Just make sure you die for the cause.
It's time the Steel Watch and its creators faced some consequences.
Yes - and the bastards who created them.
Trust me - I've seen what those Watchers can do.
Don't screw this up.
Wulbren will want to see you - we've been taking a beating, but he's ready to hit back.

EditorData.logicalname: Hasmet Barcus alive (WULBREN QUEST NOT OFFERED)

Text.Value: You're joking, right? That thing's one of a kind.
If you believe in freedom, they're your problem.
That bomb will save a lot more people than it kills.
Yes, but I'll do it my own way.
No - Wulbren wants to kill innocents. He's a fanatic.
You're here? Good luck - this damned city's more treacherous than the Underdark.

EditorData.NodeContext: Mild surprise at the player being here/recognising them - but mainly irritated at Barcus for Wulbrens's sake

Text.Value: If you want peace, you don't just break the sword - you kill the one who wields it.
Think you ought to be somewhere else, don't you?

EditorData.NodeContext: Slightly spiky; the player is starting to get on her nerves

Text.Value: Wulbren will want to see you - we've been taking a beating, but he's ready to hit back.
Rothéshit - Wulbren's the only person standing up to Gortash.

EditorData.NodeContext: rothéshit = the shit of a rothé = ROW-thay-shit

Text.Value: Yes - but with a heavy heart. The collateral damage seems... unnecessary.
That's the plan - I'm not comfortable with the collateral damage, though.
Going to help us clear those Watchers from the streets?
I thought you had stones. Guess I was wrong.
They're your problem, not mine.
Keep walking, greyskin - if it were up to me, your kind wouldn't have any part in what we're doing.
Good - the Watchers are only a weapon.

EditorData.NodeContext: Glad of the player's involvement/confident in Wulbren's plan

Text.Value: It's Wulbren you should be speaking to, not me.

EditorData.logicalname: Hasmet Barcus Dead (WULBREN QUEST NOT OFFERED)

Text.Value: Don't get cold feet - if you don't eliminate the Gondians, they'll rebuild.

Synopsis: Ironhand gnome Thulla hiding in a smithy cellar (came from Act1).
